website_summaries.verdict: The perfect table for kids during small play. A lot of simple additions extend play and productivity for young children.
pros: Integrated Lego table works with any piece, keeping all the small parts contained in one location
cons: Assembly can take longer than other tables

website_summaries.verdict: This table sits 2 feet off the ground for taller kids who like to build.
pros: LEGO construction pegs on one side of the table top, solid surface on the other side
Can be used with regular sized LEGOs or larger sized building blocks like Duplo blocks
Decent quality on a table works for many ages of children
Also comes in an option with chairs
cons: The baskets could be stronger, and the design puts them in what would otherwise be legroom under the table

customer_reviews.title: Great concept for use for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great concept for use for kids. Wish it were made with better materials. Description says it is made with hard wood but it is definitely particle board and the bottom of the trays are just thin pieces of cardboard. I probably would have been better off getting an old wood table from the salvation army and permanently glue the lego plates on myself with plastic storage drawers underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find a lego table that also looks nice in a playroom. This is perfect! I added cute white stools from target to finish the look.
customer_reviews.author: karissa

customer_reviews.title: Great table, good quality and strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This little table was the most awesome gift for my 4 years son, When I received the product it was packaged well. The quality is excellent. I put it together by myself it was really easy. The size is perfect for the room. Very happy with this purchase and I believe it will get good usage for a number of years. Perfect for toddlers and young children. I would definitely recommend this to friends!!!
customer_reviews.author: JASON VICTORY

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: So awesome! Seriously the best investment ever with 3 boys! Im so glad i chose this as a birthday present for my 3 year old! My 3 year old and 5 year old spend hours here playing with their legos! Its a great solution to them being on the floor and stepping on them! Best momey ever spent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good design for different ages.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product.....both Duplo size and regular sized Lego can be secured to the table at the same time ....both of my grandsons use this table at the same time....I especially like the two pull out drawers. we put the larger Duplo size on one side and the other has the small size Legos.
customer_reviews.author: Bill J. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table. Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. Solid construction. Well made. My grandchild loved it. After using it a couple weeks, she said she did not attach her lego project to the table because while she was putting it together she kept turning it around to add more pieces. I guess it depends on what kind of lego project a person is working on. You can flip the table top over to a smooth side too. The storage drawers underneath are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to put together. The drawers look shallow, but they hold a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works with LEGO & LEGO DUPLO
customer_reviews.text: My boys love it, they play together and build all sorts of things. It works with lego products, meaning DUPLO legos DO fit without problem as seen in the attached picture. I am not sure about knock off brand building blocks, I would assume those are the "legos" people complain about not fitting. Table is sturdy and very well made. The drawers make it convenient to store legos or other items so the kids can play in a small area and not have to run around trying to find their legos. That being said it saves your feet. Get it for any lego youngsters out there, they love it.
customer_reviews.author: TrippyLippy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little table!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little table for my 4 and 5 year old grandkids with room to grow! I put two 12inch chairs with it and it worked out perfectly. Super easy to assemble in about 30 mins. Received in perfect undamaged condition. Very sturdy table.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poor quality and workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Concept is excellent, but cheaply made. Table top coating scratched very easily, flip board made of paper/wood laminate that got damaged when taking out of the packaging. Sliding bins a pain to get into position and hard to tighten down. Tablet height too low, can't fit an 11-inch chair comfortably underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: Winner winner
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson absolutely loves this. Bought for his birthday a month ago and still being used daily. He is four and his 11 year old sister likes playing with it too. It’s easy to assemble and sturdy enough to withstand use. Would definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: cowluver1

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not Duplo compatible as stated
customer_reviews.text: Cute table. Sturdy construction. Took my husband about 30 min to assemble. Love the baskets underneath to store LEGO’s. Description says LEGO or Duplo compatible. I was wondering how that is possible and turns out it’s not. I’m disappointed because my son only plays with Duplos so far and they do not fit to the base plate. So desceiptiom is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Jarmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Table Missing One Feature.
customer_reviews.text: Lot the table, the only reason I’m giving it 4 stars is because with my son on a standard kid chair with the drawers he can’t put his legs under. We have to pull the drawers out so he can sit on a chair. Not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: It's an awesome table !
customer_reviews.text: What kid wouldn't love a table that they can color on, then flip the top over and play with Legos? And what parent wouldn't love a table that after playing with Lego's they can slide open the storage bins underneath and just push all the Lego's (or other toys) into them ? Its perfect ! So far it's only been on the Lego side and the things my grandson has created are endless. It's worth every penny. And it seems to be pretty study as it's held up this far ! My grandson is tough on furniture. I highly recommend this table and chairs (sold separately). Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: mary d.

customer_reviews.title: Great lego table!
customer_reviews.text: I did a deep dive into the reviews before purchasing this for my 6 year old's birthday. We've had it for a few months now and I feel as if I can truly say its great! It holds up pretty well (for the price point, it is just as sturdy as I would expect). We haven't had any problems with the drawers breaking yet (the most common complaint from other reviewers)- my two boys are pretty rough on toys, so I'm impressed the drawers are still holding up! Perfect size, great storage, easy to assemble, fun piece to add to my boys' shared room. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: is a comfortable height for him to work at the table standing ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yo son loves this table! It matches his furniture well, is a comfortable height for him to work at the table standing while building LEGO towers. Very sturdy and easy to assemble alone.
customer_reviews.author: Reb1458

customer_reviews.title: great quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: I just assembled this two days ago so, I'm not sure how it will hold up? However, I was pleased to discover that most of this table is made out of solid wood. I was able to put this together myself (without my husbands help), and it was for the most part easy to assemble. My son loves it and has been playing with it every day since his birthday. I chose this one over the other tables because I wanted something small and compact to fit into our tiny living space plus I liked that it came with storage bins built in. This is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Noel

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever just wanted to drop kick something you’re putting together? That is this table. Not only is it cheap, but it has chips everywhere, the Dowel rods are about 3 sizes too small so they serve no purpose (I can actually hear them move if I shimmy the table) and the actual configuration of the table makes it impossible to screw in 4 necessary screws without a special tool that I don’t own. The whole thing just was a pain in the a** and a huge disappointment. I should have been paid to take this table instead of paying for it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Burns

customer_reviews.title: Bad Service,
customer_reviews.text: I chose this table, because it has storage space. My hundred set up them for the boy when I was on business travel. The package was good so we didn't check them piece by piece before assembling. However, when it's almost finished, we found the table top is damaged. And the screws for the chairs are too short to lock the seat tops with the chairs. Then, when I was back home, I took photos and wrote to the seller. The seller is very kind and sent me the new table with chairs. The new set looks nice. I believe my boy can use it till 4-5 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table !
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great table! I purchased it for my sons 2nd birthday and he can’t get enough of it ! He immediately went to it to sit at it and play. It’s sturdy, quality material and the storage drawers are a great addition . It’s a perfect size to grow with him and we love the versitility of making it a LEGO/ regular table Easy to wipe clean. All around great buy !
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table!!!! It is great for my 5 year old son. It was easy to put together and looks really nice in my living room because it’s not plastic. I love the storage drawers. We got the matching chairs and the whole set is just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Herriage

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware of Poor Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Would give a higher rating, BUT customer service is really bad. We got this for my sons birthday in FEBRUARY, and got a table top with a big scratch in it. I contacted the seller and she said she would send me a new table top and never did. Now my emails are being ignored so I paid $100 for a scratched table. Poor customer service. Buyer beware! This could be a nice table. The drawers glide easily and they aren’t easily pulled out, which is nice for toddler use.
customer_reviews.author: Celene Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value. Great play potential.
customer_reviews.text: This was far more sturdy and far heavier than I ever imagined it would be for the money. It has become the base of all of my kid's play, even when they are not playing Lego. It is attractive as far as childrens furniture goes and the finish seems very durable. The baseplates are not Lego brand but they feel and look like spec plates and they hold Lego brand bricks very securely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT! Such a great gift for our grandson. The best part is the tabletop turns over making it either a plain table or LEGO board.
customer_reviews.author: GirlCopInFL

customer_reviews.title: Quick assembly, sturdy, perfect for Lego and Calico Critters!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are loving this!! I originally got it for my daughter thinking she could use the solid table too for calico critters and put her extra critters and accessories in the drawers. She is loving using the LEGO top too though! It is super easy to flip, they love doing it themselves. The table is very sturdy. They are going to enjoy this for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Annie S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with some suggestions
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my son wanted. He did not want one where you had to lift the table top off to get to the legos. He is able to work on his lego and just pull the drawers out to get the pieces he needs and not knock over his "masterpieces". Only suggestion would be to sell it with a matching chair. As its to tall to sit on the floor and a little to low to stand the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Zmolek

customer_reviews.title: Drawers cant hold enough legos without breaking
customer_reviews.text: Table itself is great and love we can use the lego side and flip for the regular table side. But once we bought my son more legos for his birthday both the drawers gave out and just fell down to the ground. The drawers were not all the way full, I'd say closer to half full and they cant handle the weight. So you'll have to find another place to store the legos unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY

customer_reviews.title: Zero complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Taller height was perfect. Wish it had come in white though, like the shorter one. Either way, we love it. Great place for my son to do Legos, or we can flip it over for coloring/eating, etc. Zero complaints, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: #Winning
customer_reviews.text: The red totes that come with this seem idealistic but they kept falling off several times a day. So we just made due without them. As for everything else, EVERYTHING IS AWESOME! Yes regular legos fit on the Lego part of the table and it's a great addition to our 5 year olds room!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholle Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter loves this new table! Her and I put it together in about 30-45 minutes, a drill is helpful but not necessary. The only negative to this table is that my daughter can’t actually sit at it appropriately because the shelves below the table take up her leg room. So she either sits sideways or kneels. I’m not sure if I can raise the legs but I’m going to try. Her duplo pieces do fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Guillen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids, Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have been in search of a good kids table at a reasonable price and this one fit the bill. This table is perfect for my little guys, ages 2 and 4. They can sit or stand at the table to do all of their projects. Very easy to assemble and clean (crayon, marker, paint, etc). The drawers are fairly large and hold all of my kids treasures.
customer_reviews.author: KJTMR2013

customer_reviews.title: If your kids have Legos, you NEED this table.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is one of the best purchases I've made for my kids, I wish i would have got it a couple of years ago. Now there is no more stepping on Legos on the floor or finding Legos in every box and drawer in the house. Now I can sit on the sofa rather then the floor when my kids want me to help them build. The kids now keep all the Legos together on the table or in the drawers. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking table; however.....
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking table; however, the drawers didn't want to stay on track. My husband had to make a "shimmy" to keep the drawers from falling off the track. It works okay now, and it does look nice..
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. We got it to replace a regular kids table in my son's room. He needed somewhere for those thousands of Lego pieces! This works perfectly. Even with the thousands of pieces he has, there is still a lot of room left in the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Mintheshoe

customer_reviews.title: This table is absolutely great! I ordered the flash furniture chairs that are ...
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely great! I ordered the flash furniture chairs that are recommended to fit and I would say this table was a win!
customer_reviews.author: erin elizabeth laferriere

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: It was kind of a pain to put together, definitely needed a second set of hands. I got it because I thought it would be nicer to look at than plastic in bright colors since it would be in our living room and not just a play room. The table top also scratches really easily. I had hoped for better given the price and the fact that it doesn’t come with any chairs..
customer_reviews.author: Aliesha

customer_reviews.title: Cute table
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice looking Lego table. The table seems sturdy but I’m not 100% sure exactly how long it will last based on the wood composite material. I would definitely keep any liquids away from it. The drawers are nice but were a pain to get screwed in (tiny spaces). I do have a kidkraft Lego table but I think I prefer this table because it looks more like a table and it’s easier to get to the Lego storage compared to the kidkraft table. Overall I’m pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Viseur

customer_reviews.title: Lego Fun
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to receiving this table to gift to my grandchild for Christmas. Unfortunately, it came broken but when I contacted Amazon, they immediately took care of matters. I was extremely disappointed at the way the table was defective, but was very pleased with the steps taken by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: elsa daponte

customer_reviews.title: Versatile table
customer_reviews.text: I took stars off because it already has some marks and dings from putting it together. Otherwise, it’s greAt and easy to assemble. It’s a little heavy for small hands to flip over. It serves our purposes well. Our young child even uses the plain side as a diner.
customer_reviews.author: LindseyLou85

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table and easy to assemble. Only issue I had was rod for basket drawer split during assembly which required me to glue and redrill the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with duplo or mega blocks.
customer_reviews.text: This table is not compatible with duplo blocks or mega blocks. IF you risk buying it, test the lego side before fully assembling the table to see if they fit. I read the reviews that said the same and I ignored the bad ones because I wanted it to work. It just doesn’t. If a grown woman can’t get the blocks to stick, a toddler isn’t going to be able to either. This is false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley V

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice Lego table
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good little table. Looks nice. After playing on it the kids wish it was a little bigger for more Legos but it is what it is. Also you need to watch the younger kids around the pull out drawers - if they lean on them they do feel like they would break.
customer_reviews.author: Gray L.

customer_reviews.title: Good table with storage
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The height fits my 3 year daughter. However the LEGO board does not work with duplo sets. I bought this for the flip top design, however it turns out to be useless because we never used the LEGO side. The drawers are quite useful though.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: LEGO compatible table
customer_reviews.text: The green base is not LEGO. But it's LEGO compatible. It assembles reasonably easy. Not sturdy, you wouldn't want to sit on it or have a child climb on it, but fine for small kids to use. It's not cheap, but a name brand one would be much more.
customer_reviews.author: Sandiway Fong

customer_reviews.title: Not washable
customer_reviews.text: The table is build well. It also looks great, well until your child paints or draws on it. Paint (even washable markers and paint) is not washable from this table. Even using magic eraser did not work. This is really disappointing. The table is no longer white.
customer_reviews.author: Eva B

customer_reviews.title: Great concept not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Really like the idea of the product. But not well made. I had to order 3 different ones to get it looking good. But it still came with cracks and chips in it.
customer_reviews.author: sdharri5

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy drawers
customer_reviews.text: What better Christmas present for a 6yr old who loves legos! It also is little bigger than his old lego table. It's a lil taller, lil wider and wood border around lego frame is wider too. I love the drawers too. They don't come out after u assemble which is good when u have a 3 yr old too. And i love how sturdy they are which i was worried about. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: samspoofyorganics

customer_reviews.title: Lego/block activity table
customer_reviews.text: The table is nice quality but mine was damaged on the edges where the reversible top goes( chipped ) . It was already gifted so I did not try to return it. The storage drawer was not as easy to assemble as the table and the instructions were not helpful.
customer_reviews.author: MBOKC

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. Looks great in my son's room. Works with both duplex Legos and reg Legos. Easy to put together, took me maybe 30 min. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a 5 year old with a Lego obsession. It has been perfect for him. It is sturdy and the large canvas drawers hold an ample supply of legos. The grid side allows for saving projects that are not complete. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Charlynn

customer_reviews.title: Is not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The product is pretty simple to install doesn’t have much storage and is not very sturdy. I haven’t had this product very long and it’s already looking like it’s going to break. Very wobbly. Already tightened screws twice.
customer_reviews.author: Letticia

customer_reviews.title: Easy install without power tools (assembled by mom & 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy install without power tools (assembled by mom & 7 year-old). Just pay attention to the orientation of parts. Kids loved it! Clean simple real wood design.
customer_reviews.author: TOLGA SEYMEN

customer_reviews.title: Accurate website description
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit of a pain to get the drawers attached bc the fit was sooo tight. But it only took about 30 minutes with the headache of the drawers. Other than that my daughter loves it and now I don’t have to deal with legos in the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Table
customer_reviews.text: The table seem to be well built, be sure to see where all the part are to be inserted before you proceed to put the table together, the 4 dowel rods are to be inserted into the legs/tabletop to secure the join, had to take the table back apart to insert them! The drawers can be a little tricky, but assembled with 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: It’s a nice little activity table
customer_reviews.text: This was somewhat easy to build. One problem is the one drawer does not pull in and out smoothly. It rubs and sticks. Not sure why. The other drawer works great. Overall it is a nice little table.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Engineering
customer_reviews.text: It's not super easy to assemble in large part because the holes don't line up. In addition, after assembling, it lasted less than 6 weeks before the drawers fell out, again, because all of the cut pieces do not line up exactly. If you want to try an extreme engineering project, buy this table.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Headache
customer_reviews.text: I received this table tonight and the instructions are to an entirely different table!! Tools and parts don’t match at all. It’s a guessing game at this point. Disappointed after spending $100
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: LEGO table
customer_reviews.text: Buyers please pay attention this is not a Duplo Lego table. It appears to have Duplo Legos on it in the Amazon picture, but it is a table for the tiny Legos. But it is a beautiful, sturdy table.
customer_reviews.author: Pat from Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 yr old daughter and she loves it. The price is a bit much on my opinion but it is worth it. She spends more time playing her legos more than being on her iPad. It is sturdy and quality made. The storage is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid Sturdy Table
customer_reviews.text: If you read the instructions this table is fast and easy to assemble. My two grand boys love it along with the two matching chairs. Everything from Lincoln Logs to Legos to Weeble Wobbles are played with on this very sturdy table. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: COCO RODENT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect! It’s a huge hit with my 2 1/2 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson and he is enjoying it. The only thing wrong was one dowel was too short so we had to buy one that fit so we could put it together for Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crate table sturdy love that it flips over to a regular table ...
customer_reviews.text: Crate table sturdy love that it flips over to a regular table and a Lego table. My only complaint is that the one drawer came out and we were unable to get it back in after only one month. I guess we have to take it apart to get the drawer back in , other than that great Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s an awesome table!!
customer_reviews.text: This table is so cute! And I love that it has a storage place for legos or school supplies. It’s study, easy to assemble and I had no issues with dents or paint or anything of that soldier. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: SusieM

customer_reviews.title: Kid Table
customer_reviews.text: This product is very durable. It has two different sides for the kids to use their imagination. We purchased fo our 6 year old son for his Legos and he loves building and storing the unwanted Legos in the bins under the table. This is a great product and really good price. I will purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! Feels very sturdy and my 6 year old loves it too! My only complaint is the board you can flip to reverse the top is extremely heavy heavy for me let alone my 6 year old. But it works really well otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this Lego table
customer_reviews.text: Love this Lego table!!! Very well made and easy to assemble. The drawers slide in and out smoothly and have a lot of storage. My 5 and 3 year old sons both build classic legos on it daily.
customer_reviews.author: jmcaz4

customer_reviews.title: Could be good but
customer_reviews.text: Seem like would be a nice table. Missing parts and broken parts. Tried to request the missing parts and broken parts so we won’t have to go through returning entire table but no help.
customer_reviews.author: kc11good ca

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste the money love.
customer_reviews.text: Dont know who designed it but it was insanely difficult to put together. Definitely not worth the money or stress for something you could probably make something similar to yourself for less money and stress. Just buy the Lego base plates from the dollar tree online and glue them to a regular kids table or nightstand with a drawer of your choice. Much, much easier for almost the same product.
customer_reviews.author: Anon98

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble once I found a video on YouTube! Mine came with instructions for a different table. Other than that issue I’m excited to put this in use. My little one will love it and I like the storage space. It looks like a nice piece of furniture too in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this table!
customer_reviews.text: I have two young boys and this table is perfect for them to sit and eat lunch as well as play legos. It was easy to put together but is very sturdy. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great must have item
customer_reviews.text: Great quality item. My kids 5 and 3 years old love this thing. Holds all their many Legos. Having a building surface for them has been a blast. Daughter said it was her favorite present for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Scriber

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional Lego table
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with purchasing this item we always had to clear a place for my grandson to do his Legos or to draw and color. The table is very sturdy & looks really nice. It was easy to put together until the very end, where you had to do the drawers. You might need two people. Actually cost for such a nice table.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Angelo-Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, nice table. But one drawer didn’t fit it was way to small.
customer_reviews.text: I love this table and my 2 boys love it as well, attaching the drawers on the table is a pain and you will need help doing that. One of the drawers was way to small to fit the table and it kept falling off so we screwed it on the sides and it doesn’t open. It doesn’t bother me but it would be nice if both drawers worked the way they’re supposed to. The instructions said it would take 30 minutes to assemble but it took close to 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great table for legos & other activities
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy table. Was a hit on Christmas morning. We had some dings/dents but the company was great to work with and they sent us s replacement. Just wish we bought it with chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Table leg became loose right away and then the drawers won’t stay in. Customer service initially reached out to me to try to try to the problem by sending me a new leg. After explaining what part I needed they never followed up with me. We’ve only had this a short period of time and I’m afraid I’ll have to throw it out soon.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Borrell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this table very much. We bought it for our 5 yo such that she has a place to assemble and store her Lego sets. This one fulfills that purpose but also looks really nice. Fairly easy to assemble and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Instructions missing
customer_reviews.text: I spent 10 minutes searching for the parts needed to start the assembly only to realize the sent the wrong instructions. Spent another 20 minutes trying to find a video on how to assemble with no luck. Tried to figure it out and then discovered they also sent the wrong screws nuts set. The table itself seems fine... Of only I could assemble it
customer_reviews.author: Santos Matias

customer_reviews.title: Kid’s love it!
customer_reviews.text: Putting the drawers in took some patience, but we’ve had it now for 4 months xx and it’s still going strong with weekly use by a 5 yr old and 16 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table that will last
customer_reviews.text: Good table very sturdy. It takes a while to assemble it by my self. Yet it well deserves the effort and the good reviews on Amazon. A little expensive comparing to others, I am still happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Asdet

customer_reviews.text: It wasn't 30 minute assembly like it stated but wasn't too bad. My daughter loves it. It's an awesome Lego table and for $95 it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: A.Messenger

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew who is 6 for his birthday. It's a nice looking table and I especially like that this model has drawers for storage
customer_reviews.author: Lone Crow Adventures

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little table
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this table. It’s sturdy, easy to assemble and comes with everything you need to put it together. It’s kid of y’all so I’m thinking of getting them some stools.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Haddix

customer_reviews.title: (The initial dowel rod had been drilled but it was terribly off center)
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could rate this higher but a part was not very well constructed and broke as we were putting it together. We had to go get another dowel rod drilled and painted to finish the table. (The initial dowel rod had been drilled but it was terribly off center). It's a nice concept, but we were just disappointed in the construction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Originally listed as table and chairs, I purchased this for my Grandchildren and had it sent direct. I was disappointed when it arrived with No Chairs. Vendor offered apology, would have liked a deal on the chairs....
customer_reviews.author: Alex Kortzman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Piece!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This is such a nice piece of furniture! I searched for this over the Christmas holidays and could not find it! I finally found one and it was worth the wait! It looks so nice and it is a great size for more than one person to be building at once. I just love this Lego table!
customer_reviews.author: Daves Mom Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - cute product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. It seems sturdy and looks really cute. I’ve had it about a month and have been happy with the quality. It took about 20 minutes to put together but wasn’t bad. Duplo blocks do fit on it although it’s not duplo brand so you have to push a bit harder than you might usually. I suspect Legos would fit too. My daughter loves it!! She’s 1.5 year old. It’s something she’ll use for many years though so if you’re balking at the price consider how long you’ll use it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved this multi use white table!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter loves playing tea party and legos on this table. She has two white chairs that we bought to go with the table.
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Beware of drawers
customer_reviews.text: Love this table for my toddler. We purchased chairs from a different location and (because of the storage drawers) you can’t push them in. Your knees also run into them when you try and sit down. I love the drawers for legos and such but it’s kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H

customer_reviews.title: Nice LEGO table!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely LEGO table. I would have given it a 5 star if it had been just a little bit bigger. Looks good and provides fun LEGO time!
customer_reviews.author: Ainahainagirl

customer_reviews.title: Highest level of recommendation
customer_reviews.text: Would buy this again and again. Quality and features make it worth the money. The height is awesome. I can’t say enough about it. If you’re thinking of buying it, just do yourself a favor and do it!
customer_reviews.author: AngelaKoren

customer_reviews.title: Poor choice in materials for drawers
customer_reviews.text: The table seems pretty sturdy for what it is, and it looks good. But the rails that hold the drawers on the bottom basically disintegrated after two weeks of use. I’ll probably find some way to rebuild them, but disappointing considering the cost of the table.
customer_reviews.author: Casey B.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Functional
customer_reviews.text: We like this table for lego construction. The drawers were a bear to install, but they are well made, as is the table.
customer_reviews.author: Red Hat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the kids! Convenient for LEGO lovers.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids for Christmas and it is exactly what I was looking for! I like that the table top can be flipped over if you want just a plain table. The storage drawers are very nice as well. There is some assembly required and the instructions are easy to understand, it just takes a little time is all. The table is pretty sturdy and only time will tell as far as durability. It’s perfect for us right now.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Roode

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The kids love playing at the lego table...be careful of the drawer slides underneath. I suggest that you put vaseline on the drawer slides.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice table. My grandson loves it for his legos, I love it for it's looks. The only thing that I would change would be the drawers. They do not come out of the table which makes it more difficult for me since I'm not that short. Overall, I would probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is nice amd easy to set up. But the corner of the table was broken and chipped when I got it, leaving a big piece of particleboard-type wood showing. I just painted over it with white paint because kids are rough on stuff anyway and I waited long enough for it to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for child lego fans
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has really enjoyed this table. Build on it all the time. Easynto.move and yet keep legos firmly mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Lego friendly table
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put togeather except screwing the draws to table. Great quality my grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.author: lou

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this table.
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year in use, and the drawers just fell off tracks and cannot hold on. Turns out the runners just failed and appear to be made of some kind of weak particle material. Very disappointing experience. Looking for support from this company and there is nothing to be found. Not at all happy, recommend other buyers look at other products.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Carey

product_meta.title: UTEX 2 in 1 Kids Construction Play Table with Storage Drawers and Built in Plate (Espresso)
product_meta.description:
Color:EspressoDESCRIPTION:

Ready, set, build! The UTEX 2-in-1 Construction Play Table features a top surface that offer a construction surface on one side and smooth surface on the other. One side of the reversible play board is compatible with most major brands blocks, giving kids a fun space to build their very own creations. The other side is a smooth surface perfect for train sets, action figures and other toys, this convertible table supports a variety of activities. Plus, the elegant finish looks great with an array of décor styles. When it's time to pack up, the storage area is beneath the surface make it easy to keep your play area neat and tidy.

FEATURES: 
Turn over the top piece to convert the table from an activity table to a regular table
Construction panels offer a sturdy place to build with select blocks (blocks are not included) 
Two storage drawers provide convenient built-in storage areas
Espresso finish lends an elegant look to your décor
This durable table with wooden legs can handle vigorous play. 
Provides ample room to play with a friend
Easy assembly helps make setup fast and simple
Keep the playtime off the floor and close to eye level, Ideal for your toddler’s bedroom, playroom, or the living room
Dimensions: 25.6"L x 25.6"W x 21H
Ideal for ages 1year up
feature_bullets: ASSEMBLED DIMENSION: This Kids Play Table is sized right for toddlers and kids aged 3+. The height is conveniently sized for young children, making it easy for them to access the table while either kneeling or sitting on the floor.

MULTI ACTIVITY TABLE: The tabletop surface is made of Double Sided Playboard ,you can converts from construction playtime table to smooth surface table for creative playtime , it provides the perfect play space for building fun! Plus, when the building is over, flip the top panel to find a smooth surface for creative play
CONSTRUCTION PANELS: Construction panel is compatible with compatible with most major building bricks.
TWO CONVIENIENT STORAGES: When it’s time to pack up the building blocks, take them away to the drawers. With all your blocks nearby, it’s easy to start building all over again.

BEST GIFT: This wooden Children's activity table is a perfect gift for any occasion. Ideal for block play , arts & crafts, dollhouses, puzzles, and more. Matches our kids chairs (ASIN: B0796S67GK, sold separately) for additional seating.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,078 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
